mapper.insert: insert into user (email, password, nickname, score) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT b.img, b.title, b.score as questScore FROM quest a join (select * from complete_quest where user_email=#{email}) b on a.id = b.quest_id order by date desc limit 3;
mapper.update:
update user set password=#{password}, nickname=#{nickname}, profile_image=#{profileImage}
email=#{email}
